name: Terra Johnson
description:
Terra Johnson has just graduated with bachelor's degree in physics and is looking for a job to jump start her career when most scientists think all women are witches more interested in magic than the sciences.

Play as Terra as she attempts to establish her life long dream of a career as a physicist when the side effects of an experimental failure seems to be sabotaging her and pushing her into the magical community of witches.  Every choice made affects her path and how those around her react to her, and all the little decisions add up to large consequences.
